description:
Hach & Rose, LLP, is a dedicated personal injury law firm serving clients across the New York City area. Our experienced attorneys have spent years honing their skills — both inside and outside the courtroom — in an effort to provide the best possible service to clients. Having worked for years in their field, our lawyers have an intimate understanding of personal injury law. We fully understand how the negligent or reckless acts of another party can cause unnecessary pain and anguish to you and your family. If you have been injured in an accident, you may be able to obtain recompense for your injuries.

Don't hesitate to contact our superb firm, which can provide vociferous, professional representation for an array of personal injury cases involving:

  • Construction Accidents
  • Work-Related Injuries
  • Car Accidents
  • Truck Accidents
  • Motorcycle Accidents
  • Train Accidents
  • Aviation Accidents
  • Product Liability
  • Defective Drugs
  • FELA
  • Exposure to Toxic Substances
  • Nursing Home Abuse
  • Premises Liability
  • Slip and Fall Accidents
  • Medical Malpractice
  • Class Actions
  • Wrongful Death
  • Asbestos
  • Workers’ Rights
  • Fires and Explosions

Our well-researched, methodical approach has worked for many clients, allowing us to obtain more than $100 million in the last few years alone. Additionally, our firm has consistently achieved some of the top results in New York. We were named a top 10 attorney nationwide by Noapia, made US News's list of Best Law Firms in 2018 and our attorneys consistently are named by Super Lawyers as top personal injury attorneys.

Call 646-741-3838 to speak with the candid personal injury attorneys at Hach & Rose, LLP.
